channel.title: Philosophy on VirtualSheep
channel.description: Recent content in Philosophy on VirtualSheep

item.title: Boson Brian and the Simulation in My Head
item.description: A thought experiment from yours truly — what if you are the simulation and I’m the reason you’re here?

item.title: The Curious Case of ChatGTP
item.description: Did I really call it ChatGTP for over a year? What started as a typo turned into a weird ride through memory glitches, multiverse musings, and the moment I finally realized… I’d been wrong all along.
